_header: When holy kirk first flowerest in youthhood
Note: Cf. Edinburgh, National Library of Scotland, Advocates’ 1.1.6 [Bannatyne MS], f. 89v.
_description: Gawin Douglas, On Conscience — four stanzas (ababbab)

CamMagPep2553.First Lines:
Quhen halie kirk first flurist in ȝouthheidprelatis wer chosin
                    of all perfectioun…
CamMagPep2553.Last Lines:
…Thow fals ens go hens thow monsture peralousGod send defens
                    with conscience in till ws
CamMagPep2553.Attributed Title: ffinis quod bischop douglas of dunkelden (p. 193)
